text_library.text: The usefull, fun and authentic social network
3 Good reasons to love sharing your life and your passions

Trenqr est un juste milieu entre Facebook et Twitter.

Sur Facebook vous tournez en rond indéfiniment avec vos "5000 amis" et le très amical "T'es qui ?" : toujours les mêmes têtes, qui font toujours les mêmes choses.

Sur Twitter vous rencontrez plus de monde, c'est vrai. Mais ils ne s'interessent à vous que l'espace d'un instant. Sauf si vous avez une Ferrari F488 Spider dans votre garage. Non ? C'est dommage ...

Sur Trenqr c'est une philosophie différente. Vous êtes ici pour rencontrer des personnes par affinité, découvrir ce qu'ils font et ce qu'ils aiment, puis en faire des amis voire des meilleurs amis. Vu comme ça, c'est bien plus intéressant !

1 |Les Tendances (ou Groupes de passionnés) sont les vitrines de vos passions. Visitez et contribuez aux Tendances qui vous plaisent ou vous passionnent. Sinon sautez le pas, créez en une ! Que vous vouliez y contribuer seul(e) ou faire participer vos adeptes. Vous avez le choix !
2 | Connectez-vous au Chat de la Tendance et échangez avec qui vous voulez. Allez y, n'hésitez pas. Ils ont autant d'appréhension que vous.
3 |Prenez contact avec les personnes avec lesquelles vous accrochez le plus et suivez-vous mutuellement pour mieux faire connaissance.
4 |Si au bout de 7 jours, vous ne vous êtes pas éloignés (vous vous suivez toujours), vous pouvez vous demander en ami. Un à la fois, pas la peine de se précipiter :)
5 |Choisissez parmi vos amis, ceux ou celles que vous voulez désigner en tant que "meilleur(e) ami(e)", pour partagez encore plus ! (fonctionnalité en cours de développement)
Official release of the first public beta release. Trenqr was published as TQR.Vb1.0 (aka « Christopher Columbus»).
Released of the beta version : TQR.VB 2.0 (aka « The Boredom Killer").
Released of the advanced beta version : TQR.Vb3.0 (aka « USS Entreprise »). What is new ? Get a look !
Released of the official blog « Trenqr, the cool vibe for all ». Learn more
Trenqr is the new social network you will love. Why ?
Because Trenqr is more than just a social network, it's a philosophy :)

When you come on Trenqr, you enter a different world. An universe with its codes, guided by established principles and common values. Because beyond features, what a social network really is if not a matter of affinity, a model of society and a living-together vision ?

What if we go back to simple things : "hello", talking, meeting new people and making new experiences ? What if we fight to create an open-minded community with few politics and a culture of freedom, mutual respect and diversity ? A culture that encourages casualness, discovery and dialogue despite our obvious differences. Less politics, no bias ! Just talk, share, having fun, enjoy each other and that's it !
To achieve these goals, we rely on an authentic and playful spirit as mentioned above, but also on innovative, useful, simple and practical solutions so you can focus on what really matter.
Once again, what Trenqr has to offer ? Nothing more than the cool universe you were asking and waiting for ! Something only Trenqr truly offers !
Can I make my account private?
No, you can not make your account private, but Trenqr is designed so that you don't need to.

In fact, when you add a photo or video on Trenqr, you choose the audience you would like to address. You may decide to add it in your private universe, which is accessible only to friends, or to make it public, as one of your Picture (or videos) of the day.
You can do it intuitively and without additional complex settings. We promise, once you have adopted, you can no longer do without it :)
What is a "Picture of the day"?

"Picture Of the Day" is a concept that allows you to publish a public photo or video and to make it available for 24 hours in the newsfeed. Beyond, people who would like to see it again, will have to visit your page.
The main adventage is to turn your post into a set of life stories speaking about your daily adventures. This concept makes your experience on Trenqr more fun and appealing.

The second advantage is to encourage users to visit pages of other users, which helps creating more affinity and social ties. As you see, this is an original and fun concept, in line with Trenqr spirit !
I have very few friends and I'm pretty lonely, could Trenqr suit me?

Of course ! Unlike other social networks, you don't need to have 5,000 "friends" to "count" or to enjoy Trenqr. For example, through our Integrated Suite of Applications, you can use Trenqr for its useful side until you meet new friends ;)
Meeting new people, having fun and discover more, is one of the reasons Trenqr exists. But offering you practical and useful solutions, is something equally important. That is the Trenqr spirit !
What do you with datas I publish on Trenqr ? Do you sell them? :(
No, we don't sell our user's datas and we will never do. Moreover, no trustworthy social network would sell datas of their users.

If your concerns refer to PRISM, the scandal that highlighted the US surveillance program, this is our view : We do not share your datas with any government agencies. Moreover, unlike companies that were cited in this case, Trenqr is not a US website. So we are not subject to the "Patriot Act".
Finally, in general we collect, process and store your datas in strict compliance with our TOS and our privacy policies.
Are my datas and communication secure ?

Yes ! We use SSL encryption technology to protect your datas during the exchanges with our servers. For a better protection, it's up to you to be vigilant and wiser to ensure the security of your account by developing good habits.
We recommend you to follow these security rules to improve the security of your account and your password.
You usually speak about freedom and respect. Do you have any automatic mechanisms to achieve your goals ?
We don't have automatic censorship algorithms because it's against our principles.
What we do is to create a friendly environment for a diversity of viewpoints. For this to happen, we focus on features and services to create a fun and common environment.

Finally, we encourage our users to respect the values of the community. In case of severe excess, it possible that an account be facing disciplinary proceedings. But nobody wants to get in there and we count on your participation to build this environment.
I'm 14 years old ! Can I signup to Trenqr ?
Yes of course ! Trenqr is available for registration for all users aged at least 12 years.
However, if regarding your country law you are a minor, we advise you to seek permission from your parents before you sign up.
I live in Canada. Will I find my place on Trenqr ?
Of course ! Trenqr has no national attachment. This is a project that exists beyond borders. Indeed, Trenqr belongs to those involved in its living.

We used to say: "Although the sun rises in the east and sets in the West, it also shines in the South and the North". Even if Trenqr comes from Europe, you are welcome whatever your nationality, your religion or your opinions.
Facebook blocked my account because I wanted to get in touch with people I did not know. Is this scenario possible Trenqr ?
No this is not our behaviours ! It is contrary to our philosophy, which encourages exchanges between users and making new experiences.
Besides, Trenqr has been designed so that we did not need to block users who might be too pushy.

For example, if you want to make a friend request, you must meet certain conditions. This specificity helps making the concept of friendship on Trenqr more authentic, while protecting our users against online harassment.
I need help for using Trenqr, do you have a manual ?

Trenqr is very easy to use. You should not have major issues to use it. In addition, you can get access when ever you want to an interactive tutorial that will help you acquire all the basics to understand and use Trenqr. Don't play yourself, enjoy it !
Then, if you want to go any further, please visit our blog where you will find news, tutorials and videos to help you take control of your account.
Finally, if our guides and tutorials were not able to answer your questions, you can get help from the community on our forum.
Is Trenqr a "politically correct" social network ? Can I be banned ?
It all depends on what you call a "politically correct"!

If you plan to use Trenqr to propagate extremist ideas, inciting acts of terror, hatred or physical and/or moral harm against a person or a selected group of people, your account may be suspended in accordance with our Terms Of Service.
Otherwise, unlike some social networks, we don't act as a moral authority. Also, in all other cases, you are free and responsible for your views even if they are not in the mainstream.

However, you should remember that Trenqr is a public place. This means that everything you say is visible to all and can be used against you in a legal affair, given the laws governing your country or hometown.
You must log in or sign up to join the community and get access to all features of Trenqr. It will be done in short time and it's free !
Welcome on Trenqr, welcome home ! I mean nearly...
Your free account on Trenqr in 3 minutes
Sign up quickly with your email
How do you want to be known on Trenqr ?
A valid and secure email address
Stronger it is, better is it !
By checking this box and clicking Sign Up, you agree to our Terms and you certify having read our Privacy policies, including Cookies Use.
There are many cities with this name. Pay attention to the number of inhabitants in order to make the right choice.
Are you sure of the accuracy of this data ?
We are checking your registration form
This is it, your account has been created !
What do you want to do now ?
Recommend Trenqr to my friends and family
The following sequence includes shocking and stultifying allusions written by an under-rated artist.
Do you want to see it anyway ?

Choose your side young padawan.
But make the good one because there will be no second chances
From which side of the force do you feel closer ?
I am heartless and a legendary looser
I am too weak to accept my real nature
I am an optimist person and I like easy victories !
See more photos and related videos
Trenqr is mostly about photos, friends and fun, but not only. This is the new trendy community coo! on the Internet you will love
Get access to more contents from
10 reasons why you will love Trenqr
Trenqr is the youngest and the <u>coolest of social network</u>. Hop in !
A <u>less politicized and contentious</u> environment : Trenqr focuses on talk, discovery and sharing
Unlike Facebook, on Trenqr you will make mostly <u>new friends who share your passions</u> !
Do more with your photos and videos
Playful, your photos and videos will make you <u>earn rewards points</u> !
<u>Pin your favorite photos or videos</u> and share them with your fans and friends
Post in a simple way your photos and videos <u>privately</u> for your friends or <u>publicly</u> for others
Useful practical applications for everyday life
Manage in an effective way your pictures and your videos thanks to your Library
Use Trenqr to <u>host your photo or video</u> and disclose it by sharing its Url
Resize, Beautify and personalize any of your photos with Studio
Save links of your favorite websites, thanks to MyFAVLINK
BONUS : Log in or sign up to enjoy Trenqr without ads
